text: kantavange mahar sandahan nokara ho (vivaha kara) ovunva oba lam novi ho (sitiyadi) talak kivahot vuvada, oba kerehi varadak nÃ¦ta. ehet ovunta yam kisivak di prayojanayak at kara denu. dhanavata tama tatvayata sarilana akarayatada, duppata tama sakti pamaninda gauravaniya andaminda (ovunta laba di prayojanayak at kara dima) honda aya kerehi Ã¦ti yutukamaki
